dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 5199 IH: Specialty Crop Research Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Slotkin introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To amend the Agricultural Research, Extension, and Education Reform Act of 1998 to reauthorize the Specialty Crop Research Initiative, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Specialty Crop Research Act of 2023.

section.header: Reauthorization of Specialty Crop Research Initiative
section.text: Section 412 of the Agricultural Research, Extension, and Education Reform Act of 1998 (7 U.S.C. 7632) is amended—

paragraph.text: in subsection (j), by striking paragraph (5); and
in subsection (k), by amending paragraph (1) to read as follows:
Of the funds of the Commodity Credit Corporation, the Secretary shall make available to carry out this section—

subparagraph.text: $80,000,000 for each of fiscal years 2014 through 2023; and
$130,000,000 for each of fiscal years 2024 through 2028.

section.header: Funding for Inter-Regional Research Project Number 4
section.text: Subsection (e) of the Competitive, Special, and Facilities Research Grant Act (7 U.S.C. 3157(e)) is amended—

paragraph.text: in paragraph (7), by inserting $50,000,000 for each of fiscal years 2024 through 2028, after 1991,; and
by adding at the end the following:
Of the funds of the Commodity Credit Corporation, the Secretary shall make available to carry out this subsection $50,000,000 for each of fiscal years 2024 through 2028.
